Summary: A close 2nd to the original hard candy
Text:
I reviewed Werther's original chewy caramels, caramel chocolates, and creamy filled
hard caramels as a BzzAgent and found the chewy caramels came a close second to the
original hard candies. Still has that great unique caramel flavor from Werther's but
now in a chewable form. I prefer the original hard candy as those little gems last
a little longer but these are a nice second choice.
